headline: How Recent Analyst Shifts Are Changing the Story for Johnson Controls
summary: Johnson Controls International’s stock narrative has shifted following an upward revision in its fair value price target, which increased from $124 to nearly $132. This change reflects a more optimistic stance from analysts, driven by strong segment performance and continued revenue momentum across the company’s core markets. Stay tuned to discover how you can track these evolving analyst perspectives and stay informed about future changes to Johnson Controls' investment outlook. Stay updated...
